channel.title: Editing help
channel.description:
I think i have a server set up but i need help wiv it.
I don't know how to make mods/admins and i dunno how to set my user as owner.
Plz help i have looked thru the files i have and tried to do it but with no success.
And i want to change some of the shops plz help
